Name: Rumble
About the game: Ever wanted to be a naked spear tossing savage? well this is your chance... Rumble is a fast paced, couch multiplayer game for one to four players. Throw rocks to stun and spears to kill, dash to avoid incoming hazards and be the last man standing. Features: 1-4 players Multiplayer mode, kill your opponents in multiple unique levels. (Local multiplayer and co-op only !)
